Name: Julie Pierce
Job Title: Chief Information Officer, Director of Information Services
Job/Team Function: Head of Information Services, responsible for ICT and Knowledge, Transparency and Resilience across Defra. Develop and deliver a portfolio of ICT, Knowledge, Transparency and Resilience services, products and programmes across Defra, e.g. end-user IT services (desktop/laptop, business applications, audio/video conferencing, related service management and user training - to 11,000 staff across core and wider Network), library and translation services, advice on FOI, information assurance and the provision of physical and personnel security. We deliver the Government’s digital agenda, seeking to transform customer experience through the deployment of digital technologies, implementing digital solutions to business problems (e.g. digital engagement and transactions, collaboration, information analysis, and synthesis in support of scientific research and policy development).

Name: Nigel Gibbens
Job/Team Function: UK/Defra chief spokesperson on animal (terrestrial and aquatic, excluding bees) health and welfare issues. Responsible for the totality of veterinary professional input to animal health and welfare policy, helping to shape policy across England and throughout Great Britain/UK, influencing its delivery through the Animal Health and Veterinary Laboratories Agency and others. Lead the Defra/England response to outbreaks of exotic animal diseases. Representation of the UK in the EU and internationally, negotiating on behalf of the UK Government. Advice and assurance on the programmes necessary to control, and, where appropriate, eradicate disease. Head of Profession for all veterinary surgeons in the Government's employment
Parent Department: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs
Organisation: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs
Unit: DCVO, Animal Health Scanning & Trade Policy

Organisation: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs

Name: Nigel Gibbens

Organisation: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs

Organisation: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs

Name: N/D
Job Title: Deputy Director, Head of Internal Audit and Assurance
Job/Team Function: Provides independent assurance on risk management, control and governance to the Permanent Secretary and to the Defra Audit & Risk Committee. This is achieved, in part, by working with the Internal Auditors and Audit & Risk Committees of Defra's Arms Length Bodies.
Parent Department: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs
Organisation: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs

Name: N/D
Job Title: Deputy Director, Head of Shared Services Business Effectiveness
Job/Team Function: Shared Services -Member of Executive Team of the shared services function for Defra and its network with specific responsibility for Business Planning, Business Communications including the Enquiry Centre and Organisational Development.
Parent Department: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs
Organisation: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs

Name: N/D
Job Title: Deputy Director, Head of Shared Services Service Delivery System and Supplier Mangement
Job/Team Function: Member of the Shared Services Executive Team. Responsible for Shared Services Directorate systems support, systems related supplier management, Payroll and Personnel Administrative Contract Employment (PACE)
Parent Department: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs
Organisation: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs

Name: N/D
Job Title: Deputy Director for Performance, Relationship and Business Management, Diversity and Pay and Reward
Job/Team Function: Deputy Director responsible for Individual Performance Management policy, Pay and Reward, Diversity Policy, business management and planning including programme and financial management for Strategic Human Resources and the realtionship with the Network Shared Service Organisation (NSSO) for HR services.
Parent Department: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs
Organisation: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs

Name: N/D
Job/Team Function: Member of Strategic HR senior leadership team. Deputy SRO for casework & management advice, employee relations & engagement, HR Business Partners, sickness absence & wellbeing.
Parent Department: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs
Organisation: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs

Name: N/D
Job/Team Function: Head of Profession for Social Research
Parent Department: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs
Organisation: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs

Name: N/D
Job/Team Function: Leading the independent review of the evidence used in designating marine Science Advisory Councils
Parent Department: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs
Organisation: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs

Name: N/D
Job/Team Function: Directing the programme of work and services within the Defra Network Data Sharing Programme and Defra Transparency Lead for public data provision, incorporating the following responsibilities: a) programme responsibilities for the UK Location Programme / INSPIRE implementation, Defra Network 'public data' provision, and Defra Network data sharing service development; b) ongoing support, covering data sharing policy, assurance and guidance to Senior Responsible Owners, development of data architectures to enable data sharing, management of data licensing and service management of crosscutting services.
Parent Department: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs
Organisation: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs

Name: N/D
Job Title: Deputy Director, Procurement and Commercial Function
Job/Team Function: Procurement strategy, policy and delivery for Defra and its Executive Agencies. Delivering the Procurement strand of the OGC Efficiency Review programme whilst ensuring Defra are amongst the leaders in the Public Sector on Sustainable Procurement.
Parent Department: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs
Organisation: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs
